text: khuda un logon ka saraparast hai jo eemaan la chuke ki unhen (gumaraahee kee) taareeqiyon se nikaal kar (hidaayat kee) raushanee mein laata hai aur jin logon ne kufr ikhteyaar kiya unake saraparast shaitaan hain ki unako (eemaan kee) raushanee se nikaal kar (kufr kee) taareekiyon mein daal dete hain yahee log to jahannumee hain (aur) yahee usamen hamesha rahenge
